channel.title: Virtual server menu
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- in the netgear dg834gt portforward guide it says that i enter the settings in the virtual server menu. where is this?
also when i type cmd. i look for the two dns server addresses(the ones that you need to enter in internet protcol dns thing) but all i see is only one dns server address which is the same as my gateway. What do i put as the alternative dns server?
All help is needed.
also could this be the reason why my server aint going online and i did what the guide said.

item.title: Virtual server menu
item.dc:creator: @hell_boi hell boi

also when i type cmd. i look for the two dns server addresses(the ones that you need to enter in internet protcol dns thing) but all i see is only one dns server address which is the same as my gateway. What do i put as the alternative dns server?
